programme.title: Child 44
Dijete 44
programme.desc:
Child 44: Directed by Daniel Espinosa. With Xavier Atkins, Mark Lewis Jones, Tom Hardy, Joel Kinnaman. A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1014763/","name":"Child 44","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1NTkxOTc5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODI0NTg0NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1014763/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"subxerogravity"},"dateCreated":"2015-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Could not keep me interested.","reviewBody":"It's not the crime drama I fully expected.

Leo is a cop in Moscow who comes across a serial killer. Most of the movie is about the challenges of being a cop in communist Russia that does not want to believe their perfect society could produce a monster and would prefer to ignore the problem, not admit to it.

I learned a lot about communist Russia in the 1950s but feel the lesson drew out the movie to a point where I just wanted to sleep.

Tom Hardy and Noomi Rapace did not electrify the screen for me, but giving some credit here, I did like Rapace's character, but I guess there was not enough for me

And I wish there was more Gary Oldman in the movie 

The movie was cold and heartless, similar to what I expected Russia was like during the time, but I was able to found no connection and became bored with the twist and turns that took the movie off its original story arch

Can't Recommend","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68495,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2015-04-17","keywords":"murder of a child,totalitarian state,totalitarian regime,soviet union,serial killer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1915792921","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE3MDcwMTk0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY2MTUxNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE3MDcwMTk0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY2MTUxNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A disgraced Soviet agent finds a connection between a string of child murders and party leadership.

A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1014763/","name":"Child 44","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1NTkxOTc5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODI0NTg0NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1014763/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"subxerogravity","dateCreated":"2015-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Could not keep me interested.","reviewBody":"It's not the crime drama I fully expected.

Leo is a cop in Moscow who comes across a serial killer. Most of the movie is about the challenges of being a cop in communist Russia that does not want to believe their perfect society could produce a monster and would prefer to ignore the problem, not admit to it.

I learned a lot about communist Russia in the 1950s but feel the lesson drew out the movie to a point where I just wanted to sleep.

Tom Hardy and Noomi Rapace did not electrify the screen for me, but giving some credit here, I did like Rapace's character, but I guess there was not enough for me

And I wish there was more Gary Oldman in the movie 

The movie was cold and heartless, similar to what I expected Russia was like during the time, but I was able to found no connection and became bored with the twist and turns that took the movie off its original story arch

programme.desc: Girl with a Pearl Earring: Directed by Peter Webber. With Colin Firth, Scarlett Johansson, Tom Wilkinson, Judy Parfitt. A young peasant maid working in the house of painter Johannes Vermeer becomes his talented assistant and the model for one of his most famous works." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0335119/","name":"Girl with a Pearl Earring","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3NTg5NDYtNWNkMC00ODZiLTljZjQtNjZhNjlhNjZiNDBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young peasant maid working in the house of painter Johannes Vermeer becomes his talented assistant and the model for one of his most famous works.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0335119/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-05-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"The painting was better than the book","reviewBody":""Girl with a Pearl Earring" tells a fictional tale about how the title painting by 17th century Dutch painter Vermeer might have come to be. Outwardly, the film is a story about the painter and a household maid who becomes the subject of the painting. Inwardly, the film is about the unspoken but palpable feelings between two people of very different stature and station which may or may not be forever cast in the crazed pigments of the masterpiece. Those who can tap into the subtle human emotional undercurrents will find this film far more satisfying than those who cannot. Regardless, all will find "Girl with a Pearl Earring" a masterpiece of filmmaking. (A-)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75814,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-01-16","keywords":"artist's model,painter,johannes vermeer,art studio,master servant relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Girl with a Pearl Earring","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3265593625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTdkOWVkZjItNDViYS00NTYwLTkxMGYtYWRkNTYwM2NmY2M2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTdkOWVkZjItNDViYS00NTYwLTkxMGYtYWRkNTYwM2NmY2M2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0916424/","name":"Peter Webber"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104308/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022758/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1256768/","name":"Tracy Chevalier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0381757/","name":"Olivia Hetreed"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mud
Mud
programme.desc:
Mud: Directed by Jeff Nichols. With Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Tye Sheridan, Jacob Lofland. Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1935179/","name":"Mud","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2MzcyODgyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4MDYwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1935179/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"callanvass"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"An exquisite piece of filmmaking, and I loved every minute of it. It's one of my favorite films of 2013","reviewBody":"Two curious young boys encounter a fugitive (Matthew McConaughey) named Mud where they live. They willingly do deeds for him, and try to reunite him with his love Juniper (Reese Witherspoon) The problem is, a bunch of bounty hunters are after Mud. 

It's always nice to see such a tremendous film of this nature, after all the garbage Hollywood tends to churn out these days. Mud is a genuine piece of filmmaking, which is not only thoughtful, but engrossing until the very end. It's deliberate slow pace ends up serving this film well, giving us time to soak it all in. I also loved the southern setting in this film, which made it all the more genuine, and realistic. The cinematography is a sight to behold, with many beautiful sights that never failed to amaze me. Mud is a very likable fugitive, and quite sympathetic in my opinion, and I give all the credit to McConaughey for that. He still has that charismatic swagger he always does, but he delves a lot deeper for this role. His good looks, give way to a dirty, greasy fugitive, who will do anything to survive, but is not void of morality. He cares about the young boys, even if it is for his own reasons. McConaughey pulls it off with conviction, and I felt he was tremendous. The best performance might just be Tye Sherdian as Ellis. For an actor his age, he was absolutely incredible, displaying many ranges of emotion throughout the film. This kid is going special places in my opinion, and I'll be shocked if he doesn't. Jacob Lofland is great as Neckbone (Ellis's best friend) Reese Witherspoon doesn't have a ton of screen time as you may think, but her character Juniper plays a pivotal part. Reese nails the part, and is gorgeous to boot. Sam Shepard adds great support as a longtime friend to Mud, as the grumpy assassin. 

Final Thoughts: Its films like this, that restore my faith in Hollywood. It's genuine, gritty, and downright absorbing. I loved this film, and I can't possibly see why anyone would dislike it. It's just a great film

9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173952,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-05-10","keywords":"southern gothic,river,friendship between boys,character name as title,lionsgate","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1899734553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMTY1MTYxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI3OTQ0OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMTY1MTYxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI3OTQ0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two teenage boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the bounty hunters on his trail and to reunite him with his true love."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew McConaughey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4446467/","name":"Tye Sheridan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5015107/","name":"Jacob Lofland"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2158772/","name":"Jeff Nichols"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064141/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0360267/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2158772/","name":"Jeff Nichols"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Far from Heaven
Daleko od raja
programme.desc: Far from Heaven: Directed by Todd Haynes. With Julianne Moore, Dennis Quaid, Dennis Haysbert, Patricia Clarkson. In 1950s Connecticut, a flustered housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0297884/","name":"Far from Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE5ODI3MTM4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjE5OTg2._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1950s Connecticut, a flustered housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0297884/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"im00sev"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Splendid","reviewBody":"I'm telling you, everybody's just falling in love with all the wrong people in this flick, but it's extremely captivating and the characters are perfectly engaging. I'm a bit shocked at some of your reviews here because I don't think many of you know much about the period. I do. To boot, I'm gay. Julianne Moore is excellent and deserving of the acclaim she's received for this role, as well as Quaid in the supporting role. The thing I think most people missed (or haven't made much comment on) is that both Kathleen and Frank are victims of heart-felt emotions at a time when expressing them is unthinkable. They are equally challenged by simple and earnest desires to "fill the void" in their lives: Kathleen with her giant colorblind heart in a cold society of bigots and Frank in his corporate supremacy and his "It's a different kind of love, Charlie Brown" headache. One reviewer said Frank was abusive, closeted (sure, obviously, duh) and an alcoholic. I guess if you'd ever been through that type of situation you might be a bit more forgiving because it is hell and I came from the 50s so trust. Each of these obviously well-developed characters is simply doing the best they can in a world where their ground-breaking feelings are out of place. I loved it. I own it. And I, clearly, do not advise that slim minds or socially challenged people attempt it. However, if you can watch a movie and not be a judge, if you can accept things not from your time and not about you but about very, very grand new ideas, it's an extremely well-made, well-acted and accurate film. I personally forgot we had so much orange and green furniture. And Moore is to be also commended on how well she wore those giant skirts :)"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45349,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-05-07","keywords":"gossip,african american,1950s,homosexual,gay kiss","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Far From Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2359689497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEyMmEwOTUtOTk1Yi00YTU0LTg2YjktOTUzZTMwODJkOTdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEyMmEwOTUtOTk1Yi00YTU0LTg2YjktOTUzZTMwODJkOTdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000598/","name":"Dennis Quaid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0371660/","name":"Dennis Haysbert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001331/","name":"Todd Haynes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042766/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001331/","name":"Todd Haynes"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winchester
Kuća duhova
programme.desc: Winchester: Directed by Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig. With Helen Mirren, Sarah Snook, Finn Scicluna-O'Prey, Jason Clarke. Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1072748/","name":"Winchester","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2OWE5OGItMTE4Yi00ZmIzLThjZDctNTU1OTMxMTc3Yjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NTM5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1072748/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"beemtoaustin"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A complete mess.","reviewBody":"Where to begin? This movie is such a missed opportunity. I lived not far from Winchester House and always saw incredible potential for a great movie, but too much has happened within the genre and changed the genre. The old scary house trick isn't what it used to be and the people behind this boring mess had no idea what they were doing. Too many jump scares, way too little story."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Horror"],"datePublished":"2018-02-02","keywords":"ghost,winchester house,widower,gothic horror,haunted house","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Tease","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2287974681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDA2NjE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyMDEwNDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDA2NjE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyMDEwNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On an isolated stretch of land 50 miles outside of San Francisco sits the most haunted house in the world. Built by Sarah Winchester, heiress to the Winchester fortune, it is a house that knows no end. Constructed in an incessant twenty-four hour a day, seven day a week mania for decades, it stands seven stories tall and contains hundreds of rooms. To the outsider it looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah is not building for herself, for her niece or for the brilliant Doctor Eric Price whom she has summoned to the house. She is building a prison, an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts, and the most terrifying among them have a score to settle with the Winchesters..."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7073477/","name":"Finn Scicluna-O'Prey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294961/","name":"Michael Spierig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294962/","name":"Peter Spierig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0380601/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0215453/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1129343/","name":"Tom Vaughan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294961/","name":"Michael Spierig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294962/","name":"Peter Spierig"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

They don't know they've been chosen - for a very specific purpose - The Hunt.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8244784/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MacQueen73"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not my usual thing - but great!","reviewBody":"Normally I can't be bothered with films like this, but I caught a few minutes of it by accident, downloaded it and watched straight through - and I loved it! Betty Gilpin is truly brilliant: totally believable as a stone-cold killer. The expressions she pulls, e.g. in the bunker when narrowly missed by an arrow, are hilarious. Totally agree with some other reviewers as well: this film is not meant to be taken too seriously. Haven't quite worked out what it's satirising, but I'm pretty hungover today so trying not to think too hard...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":88396,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-03-13","keywords":"hunting humans,gun,satire,human hunted down for sport,reference to animal farm the novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi189054745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjUzODFkYmUtMjNkYi00MzEzLTgwMzUtNGY3NTg3M2E1ZmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjUzODFkYmUtMjNkYi00MzEzLTgwMzUtNGY3NTg3M2E1ZmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"The most talked about movie of the year is the one nobody has seen … yet.\r\n \r\nTwelve strangers wake up in a clearing. programme.title: Under the Silver Lake
Skrivena poruka
programme.desc: Under the Silver Lake: Directed by David Robert Mitchell. With Andrew Garfield, Wendy Vanden Heuvel, Deborah Geffner, Riley Keough. Sam, a disenchanted young man, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5691670/","name":"Under the Silver Lake","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0NTA5MGItNDU1Yy00ZmE3LWI5NGItZDY5OGUxZjYzZGQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sam, a disenchanted young man, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5691670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"questl-18592"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Under the Bronze Lake","reviewBody":"This was a weird movie. A really weird movie. So much symbolism and crazy without a ton of explanation for anything. I love all the metaphor in it but I do wish there was more of a coherent throughline. There feels like a great conversation here about our relationship with various forms of media and reality. Garfield gives a very solid performance and it's overall engaging but it feels a little off. It's so heavy on the metaphor that the actual relationships don't really track or make sense in a meaningful enough way. And because there's not enough basis in reality it's a little tough to keep track of what all is being said here. All that said, this is a great conversation movie. You're gonna wanna talk about this one when you finish it. I also think it completely warrants rewatching to try and capture more of the symbolism and idea that went into this, if you liked it of course. All that said, this doesn't feel like a great movie for the casual movie watcher, it's a little too off-filter and abstract. It is a great recommendation for the movie fans and cinephiles out there though and given that it's readily available on Amazon Prime, that makes it an easy call for most folks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37427,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-04-19","keywords":"conspiracy,swimming pool,hidden message,los angeles california,missing girl","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2132523033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFhZDYxNDEtNzM0OC00Y2UyLTk3YTctMWFjYjM3YzRhYzM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFhZDYxNDEtNzM0OC00Y2UyLTk3YTctMWFjYjM3YzRhYzM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sam (Andrew Garfield) is a disenchanted 33-year-old who discovers a mysterious woman, Sarah (Riley Keough), frolicking in his apartment's swimming pool. When she vanishes, Sam embarks on a surreal quest across Los Angeles to decode the secret behind her disappearance, leading him into the murkiest depths of mystery, scandal, and conspiracy in the City of Angels."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1940449/","name":"Andrew Garfield"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2142336/","name":"Riley Keough"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0333410/","name":"Topher Grace"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1379002/","name":"David Robert Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0506124/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0588086/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0591253/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1379002/","name":"David Robert Mitchell"}],"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wild Rose
Divlja ruža
programme.desc: Wild Rose: Directed by Tom Harper. With Jessie Buckley, Matt Costello, Jane Patterson, Lesley Hart. A troubled young Glaswegian woman dreams of becoming a Nashville country star." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5117428/","name":"Wild Rose","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBkOTZlNmYtN2NjOS00YWM2LTk0MzMtOTEwMmIyNWIwMDA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg3MDMxNzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A troubled young Glaswegian woman dreams of becoming a Nashville country star.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5117428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"muamba_eats_toast"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Full of heart","reviewBody":"The whole story was excellently portrayed. Buckley excels both vocally and portraying the problems of so many in similar positions. It has ups and downs and doesn't shy away from challenging issues nor glorify them. Julie Walters alongside Buckley was perfect also. Although their greatness on set did outshine most of the supporting cast who had a daytime cheap tv drama feel about them although this did not take to much away. Also anything involving whispering Bob Harris has to be worth seeing. A feel good romp of a film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12418,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-04-12","keywords":"singer,country music singer,train,party,release from prison","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2535701529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzMmUxM2MtMWZkYi00ZDk2LWFjN2YtMjI3ZDc1ZTVmMjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzMmUxM2MtMWZkYi00ZDk2LWFjN2YtMjI3ZDc1ZTVmMjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fresh out of a stint in prison, Rose-Lynn is a single mom with an ankle monitor, a curfew, and a concerned mother (Julie Walters), who wants her to focus more on her two children and less on her music. But when Rose- Lynn tries to hold down a housekeeping job, her boss (Sophie Okonedo) hears her singing and becomes an unlikely supporter, intent on getting her to Nashville despite the long odds. Caught between hope and responsibility, Rose-Lynn must find her place without abandoning her raw talent and grand ambitions."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2976580/","name":"Jessie Buckley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0182588/","name":"Matt Costello"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10712277/","name":"Jane Patterson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2197777/","name":"Tom Harper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0375874/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316150/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2822756/","name":"Nicole Taylor"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Far from Heaven
Daleko od raja
programme.desc: Far from Heaven: Directed by Todd Haynes. With Julianne Moore, Dennis Quaid, Dennis Haysbert, Patricia Clarkson. In 1950s Connecticut, a flustered housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0297884/","name":"Far from Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE5ODI3MTM4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjE5OTg2._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1950s Connecticut, a flustered housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0297884/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"im00sev"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Splendid","reviewBody":"I'm telling you, everybody's just falling in love with all the wrong people in this flick, but it's extremely captivating and the characters are perfectly engaging. I'm a bit shocked at some of your reviews here because I don't think many of you know much about the period. I do. To boot, I'm gay. Julianne Moore is excellent and deserving of the acclaim she's received for this role, as well as Quaid in the supporting role. The thing I think most people missed (or haven't made much comment on) is that both Kathleen and Frank are victims of heart-felt emotions at a time when expressing them is unthinkable. They are equally challenged by simple and earnest desires to "fill the void" in their lives: Kathleen with her giant colorblind heart in a cold society of bigots and Frank in his corporate supremacy and his "It's a different kind of love, Charlie Brown" headache. One reviewer said Frank was abusive, closeted (sure, obviously, duh) and an alcoholic. I guess if you'd ever been through that type of situation you might be a bit more forgiving because it is hell and I came from the 50s so trust. Each of these obviously well-developed characters is simply doing the best they can in a world where their ground-breaking feelings are out of place. I loved it. I own it. And I, clearly, do not advise that slim minds or socially challenged people attempt it. However, if you can watch a movie and not be a judge, if you can accept things not from your time and not about you but about very, very grand new ideas, it's an extremely well-made, well-acted and accurate film. I personally forgot we had so much orange and green furniture. And Moore is to be also commended on how well she wore those giant skirts :)"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45349,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2003-05-07","keywords":"gossip,african american,1950s,homosexual,gay kiss","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Far From Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2359689497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEyMmEwOTUtOTk1Yi00YTU0LTg2YjktOTUzZTMwODJkOTdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEyMmEwOTUtOTk1Yi00YTU0LTg2YjktOTUzZTMwODJkOTdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000598/","name":"Dennis Quaid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0371660/","name":"Dennis Haysbert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001331/","name":"Todd Haynes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042766/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001331/","name":"Todd Haynes"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Big Wedding
Vjenčanje godine
programme.desc:
The Big Wedding: Directed by Justin Zackham. With Robert De Niro, Katherine Heigl, Diane Keaton, Amanda Seyfried. A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1931435/","name":"The Big Wedding","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwODUwMjg2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTc2NzkxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1931435/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pacificboy"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"The stars can't save it","reviewBody":"As a fan of four key people in the cast (De Niro, Keaton, Williams, Sarandon), it was pretty much a given that I was going to see this, even if the ads told me that I was destined for a rough ride.

There was a certain stripe of made-for-TV movie in the 1980s and early 90s, movies with titles like "Crash Course" and "Baby of the Bride." They featured casts bursting with stars of all the then-hot series (Jackee, Rue McClanahan, etc.) and wacky premises (a wacky driver's ed school! a pregnant old woman!) and were just as terrible as they looked in the ads. "The Big Wedding," from its title to its awful script, is just the big-screen version of one of those disposable made-for-TV clunkers. The only thing setting it apart is the caliber of star they managed to get for this crapfest and the "sexual" situations involved in some of the plot. Even De Niro's raunchy dialogue seems forced, as if the filmmakers were desperate to set their movie apart from bad TV movies.

That said, I expected that at least the cast would make it worthwhile. I mean, we've all watched movies just for the cast, or seen otherwise lousy movies that were redeemed to some degree by a favorite actor. None of that is the case here. De Niro's been phoning it in for the last decade or so, and this is no exception. Keaton plays the same role she's been playing since "Something's Gotta Give" put her back on the radar. Sarandon acquits herself. But worst of all is Williams, who has less than five minutes on screen in a part anyone could've played. It actually feels as if he was directed NOT to ad lib or have any fun with the role. It's an extended cameo that he could've made shine, but there is NO "Robin Williamsness" in his performance. Overall, no one in the main cast performs with any personality.

In short, don't see it unless you're completing your checklist of one of the main stars' filmographies. And even then, be prepared to be sorely disappointed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48454,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2013-04-26","keywords":"wedding,divorce,family relationships,farce,adoption","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Version 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2079761945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNDc2Mzk1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk0MzEzOQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNDc2Mzk1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk0MzEzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"To the amusement of their adult children and friends, long divorced couple Don and Ellie Griffin are once again forced to play the happy couple for the sake of their adopted son's wedding after his ultra conservative biological mother unexpectedly decides to fly halfway across the world to attend. With all of the wedding guests looking on, the Griffins are hilariously forced to confront their past, present and future - and hopefully avoid killing each other in the process. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001337/","name":"Katherine Heigl"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0951698/","name":"Justin Zackham"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188112/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0951698/","name":"Justin Zackham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111379/","name":"Jean-Stéphane Bron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837141/","name":"Karine Sudan"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winchester
Kuća duhova
programme.desc: Winchester: Directed by Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig. With Helen Mirren, Sarah Snook, Finn Scicluna-O'Prey, Jason Clarke. Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1072748/","name":"Winchester","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2OWE5OGItMTE4Yi00ZmIzLThjZDctNTU1OTMxMTc3Yjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NTM5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1072748/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"beemtoaustin"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A complete mess.","reviewBody":"Where to begin? This movie is such a missed opportunity. I lived not far from Winchester House and always saw incredible potential for a great movie, but too much has happened within the genre and changed the genre. The old scary house trick isn't what it used to be and the people behind this boring mess had no idea what they were doing. Too many jump scares, way too little story."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Horror"],"datePublished":"2018-02-02","keywords":"ghost,winchester house,widower,gothic horror,haunted house","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Tease","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2287974681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDA2NjE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyMDEwNDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDA2NjE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyMDEwNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On an isolated stretch of land 50 miles outside of San Francisco sits the most haunted house in the world. Built by Sarah Winchester, heiress to the Winchester fortune, it is a house that knows no end. Constructed in an incessant twenty-four hour a day, seven day a week mania for decades, it stands seven stories tall and contains hundreds of rooms. To the outsider it looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah is not building for herself, for her niece or for the brilliant Doctor Eric Price whom she has summoned to the house. She is building a prison, an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts, and the most terrifying among them have a score to settle with the Winchesters..."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7073477/","name":"Finn Scicluna-O'Prey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294961/","name":"Michael Spierig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294962/","name":"Peter Spierig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0380601/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0215453/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1129343/","name":"Tom Vaughan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294961/","name":"Michael Spierig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294962/","name":"Peter Spierig"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

This movie is such a missed opportunity. I lived not far from Winchester House and always saw incredible potential for a great movie, but too much has happened within the genre and changed the genre. The old scary house trick isn't what it used to be and the people behind this boring mess had no idea what they were doing. Too many jump scares, way too little story.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Horror"],"datePublished":"2018-02-02","keywords":"ghost,winchester house,widower,gothic horror,haunted house","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Tease","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2287974681","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDA2NjE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyMDEwNDI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDA2NjE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyMDEwNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On an isolated stretch of land 50 miles outside of San Francisco sits the most haunted house in the world. Built by Sarah Winchester, heiress to the Winchester fortune, it is a house that knows no end. Constructed in an incessant twenty-four hour a day, seven day a week mania for decades, it stands seven stories tall and contains hundreds of rooms. To the outsider it looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah is not building for herself, for her niece or for the brilliant Doctor Eric Price whom she has summoned to the house. programme.title: Capone
Capone
programme.desc:
Capone: Directed by Josh Trank. With Tom Hardy, Linda Cardellini, Matt Dillon, Al Sapienza. The 47-year old Al Capone, after 10 years in prison, starts suffering from dementia and comes to be haunted by his violent past." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6199572/","name":"Capone","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTVmMDU3MjctMmUxNi00NzI3LWI1NGMtMmY5MjE0MGVlMzAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk4OTc3MTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The 47-year old Al Capone, after 10 years in prison, starts suffering from dementia and comes to be haunted by his violent past.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6199572/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ripleyspussy"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"There's hardly a reference for this kind of film; it's not a traditional narrative in any sense","reviewBody":"I admired the film more than I enjoyed it, but it kept my interest throughout despite being a bit of slog at times. It's fascinating. The title 'Capone' invokes the expectation that this was a biopic of the famous gangster, but this isn't that at all. This is something very different, and very deliberately so, but due to the title it's going to confuse and disappoint most people (which is why Trank hated that he had to change it from the original title 'Fonzo' for marketing reasons). There's hardly a reference for this kind of film; it's not a traditional narrative in any sense.

What I keep thinking about is how even most gangster films who pretend to de-glamorize criminals and their lifestyle fail; it's the same problem with the "anti-" war movie that still depicts a rousing, exciting adventure next to the misery and the atrocities and thus defeats its own purpose. Rare is the war or gangster film that actually achieves to show the underlying emptiness; the ugly, banal, vulgar and sad reality that ultimately is what most lives of violence lead towards until the haunting memories are the only thing that remains.

The reason for that is obvious: nobody would watch that kind of film because it would be too bleak. But 'Capone' manages that rare feat: it's bleak - but not bleak enough to turn you off, and it's even often entertaining (in terms of its performances, the fantastic score, the beautiful cinematography). But even though this probably wasn't the film's intention, it still manages to be the ultimate deconstruction of the gangster as an "icon" - more so even than Scorsese's 'Irishman' (though it's nowhere near as good a film).

I liked Capone; it's weird (and I guess you shouldn't watch it unless you like profoundly weird little arthouse films) but this is definitely not a badly made film. I hope Trank continues on this path and makes more strange, personal films - although perhaps of the kind that are a little more accessible."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18551,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-05-12","keywords":"gangster,one word title,diaper,adult diaper,feces","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1375387161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYzODBlZjQtMDIyNy00ZjkwLWFhM2QtYTAyMzM0OTc1YzJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYzODBlZjQtMDIyNy00ZjkwLWFhM2QtYTAyMzM0OTc1YzJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"The 47-year old Al Capone, after 10 years in prison, starts suffering from dementia and comes to be haunted by his violent past."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362766/","name":"Tom Hardy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004802/","name":"Linda Cardellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000369/","name":"Matt Dillon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2503633/","name":"Josh Trank"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0563088/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2503633/","name":"Josh Trank"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

But 'Capone' manages that rare feat: it's bleak - but not bleak enough to turn you off, and it's even often entertaining (in terms of its performances, the fantastic score, the beautiful cinematography). But even though this probably wasn't the film's intention, it still manages to be the ultimate deconstruction of the gangster as an "icon" - more so even than Scorsese's 'Irishman' (though it's nowhere near as good a film).

I liked Capone; it's weird (and I guess you shouldn't watch it unless you like profoundly weird little arthouse films) but this is definitely not a badly made film. I hope Trank continues on this path and makes more strange, personal films - although perhaps of the kind that are a little more accessible.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18551,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-05-12","keywords":"gangster,one word title,diaper,adult diaper,feces","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1375387161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYzODBlZjQtMDIyNy00ZjkwLWFhM2QtYTAyMzM0OTc1YzJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYzODBlZjQtMDIyNy00ZjkwLWFhM2QtYTAyMzM0OTc1YzJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"The 47-year old Al Capone, after 10 years in prison, starts suffering from dementia and comes to be haunted by his violent past.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362766/","name":"Tom Hardy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004802/","name":"Linda Cardellini","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000369/","name":"Matt Dillon"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2503633/","name":"Josh Trank"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0563088/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2503633/","name":"Josh Trank"],"duration":"PT1H43M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Color Out of Space
Boja iz svemira
programme.desc:
Color Out of Space: Directed by Richard Stanley. With Nicolas Cage, Joely Richardson, Madeleine Arthur, Elliot Knight. A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5073642/","name":"Color Out of Space","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTM4M2UtMTQxNS00YjdjLTgwZGYtZTgzYmFiYjFkYzNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5073642/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Impartial-Reviewer"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Careful What You Summon!","reviewBody":"Color Out of Space starts with Lavinia, the young daughter of the Gardner family, conducting a ritual to help her sick mother and to get her out of her secluded farm, out of coincidence or may be it was summoned a a strange meteorite strikes the farm which has along what it carries an apocalyptic effect over the whole family and maybe the whole world.

A decent modernized yet disturbing adaptation of H.P. Lovecraft's "The Colour Out of Space", as well as the horror factor I believe the film touches some humanity aspects as well in a family relationship and connection. The acting was aqueduct by all, I give the filmmakers props for painting the scenes with the colored effects of the meteorite which seemed flowing out. I believe it's a shame not to pay much attention for the the science behind the events e.g., the sound effects of the crash which felt off, the meteorite size compared to the impact crater.

Yet by the ending of this cosmic trippy horror whether the audience loved it or loathed it, it's hard to deny that it's an interesting visual ride which floats the movie over its B Horror roots."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":40874,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2021-08-10","keywords":"meteorite,farm,alpaca,farmhouse,hydrologist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi735493913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM3MGQyZDEtYTFiMi00MzFiLWE4ODQtY2NiMzMzYzIyZjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM3MGQyZDEtYTFiMi00MzFiLWE4ODQtY2NiMzMzYzIyZjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000613/","name":"Joely Richardson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4699715/","name":"Madeleine Arthur"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822582/","name":"Richard Stanley"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0440557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692305/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0244345/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522454/","name":"H.P. programme.title: Chasing Mavericks
Surferi
programme.desc:
Chasing Mavericks: Directed by Michael Apted, Curtis Hanson. With Gerard Butler, Jonny Weston, Elisabeth Shue, Abigail Spencer. When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1629757/","name":"Chasing Mavericks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc5MTU5MTk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzg3NjcxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1629757/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"roadpoo"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"FANTASTIC Surfing flick & actors","reviewBody":"For the life of me I don't know why it has a low review-- it's an amazing surfing movie. Heck, I'm not even a surfer and went into this very critical (I rarely go to sporty movies / inspirational flicks).

It's based on a TRUE story, has fantastic footage of surfing (after viewing how-to's I am now amazed at how they pulled this off), & features superb acting. 

If you're looking for some ridiculous explosions, sex, and nonsensical action prepare to be impressed with something deeper. I loved how they didn't go with the norm simply to satisfy the masses.

This is a down-to-earth flick for people who are looking for something that really hits home and I would go spend $11 to re-watch this.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31853,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2012-10-26","keywords":"bare chested male,briefs,white briefs,male underwear,tighty whities","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3341722905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDA5NjU1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDA1MTQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDA5NjU1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDA1MTQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When 15-year-old Jay Moriarty discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, is not only real, but exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4103976/","name":"Jonny Weston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000223/","name":"Elisabeth Shue"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000776/","name":"Michael Apted"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000436/","name":"Curtis Hanson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073388/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0758002/","name":"Kario Salem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2249435/","name":"Jim Meenaghan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0393714/","name":"Brandon Hooper"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

An extraordinary look at the lives of a middle-aged couple in the midst of the wife's breast cancer diagnosis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6012380/","name":"Ordinary Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODIwNDVlODEtMGIxNC00OGQ4LTgzMmUtNmI4MjJhYjU3MDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDY2MjcyOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"An extraordinary look at the lives of a middle-aged couple in the midst of the wife's breast cancer diagnosis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6012380/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Real and raw","reviewBody":"This film tells the mundane lives of a married couple, until their world is smashed by cancer. The plethora of emotions are portrayed very well. It is real, raw and very moving. I can relate to every scene, as they look like real life."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3661,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2019-12-06","keywords":"cancer,middle aged couple,chemotherapy,gay couple,hospital","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1637400345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGZlZjUzZjYtN2I3MC00MWQzLWI4Y2YtNWE1M2ZhMzk4ZGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGZlZjUzZjYtN2I3MC00MWQzLWI4Y2YtNWE1M2ZhMzk4ZGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Joan and Tom have been married for many years. There is an ease to their relationship which only comes from spending a lifetime together and a depth of love which expresses itself through tenderness and humor in equal part. programme.title: Good People
Dobri ljudi
programme.desc: Good People: Directed by Henrik Ruben Genz. With Sam Spruell, Michael Fox, Diarmaid Murtagh, Francis Magee. Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1361318/","name":"Good People","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxOTk5ODc0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA3MzExMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1361318/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Does it pay to be good?","reviewBody":"And what is good anyway? Who defines what actions are good? Or if good people are not capable of doing bad things? And would that make them bad people? Don't get it twisted though: This is not a philosophical look at those things. If you even remotely asks those questions, it's not because the movie intended to make you think that much. It's your own perception that goes that extra mile (or two).\n\nThe movie moves along nicely, you can see almost everything coming your way and it's decent, if you're not annoyed by the standard formula this uses. It's nice to see another french actor making the move into "mainstream" Hollywood, even if he's not in it that much. Decent or a time waster, depending on your threshold","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16132,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-21","keywords":"female rear nudity,shot in z bathroom,american,nosebleed,jogging","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Good People","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2175187481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1MmRhZDgtNjA4NS00YmJiLWIyMWYtYjQ5MTdkNDI3MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1MmRhZDgtNjA4NS00YmJiLWIyMWYtYjQ5MTdkNDI3MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Good People"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005028/","name":"Kate Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313227/","name":"Henrik Ruben Genz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0192833/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0340831/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2951879/","name":"Marcus Sakey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1031176/","name":"Kelly Masterson"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bosch
Bosch
programme.desc: Bosch: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer. With Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"c_l_costa"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of Michael Connelly's Bosch books, I was looking forward to seeing this pilot and I wasn't disappointed. Titus Welliver is the perfect Bosch, the rest of the cast are just as brilliant and the writing and production are both spot on. The story line is in fact two Bosch books woven into one and it has been done very cleverly. Bosch fans have been waiting for twenty years for this character to be put onto film but for me, it was worth the wait. I would dearly love to see this made into a complete series. Titus Welliver is as brilliant as always and has the tormented look behind his eyes that any Bosch fan would expect to see. He may not physically resemble Harry but that is soon forgotten. Watch, enjoy, rate and share!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":57088,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-02-06","keywords":"father daughter relationship,homicide detective,police procedural,police detective,based on novel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920038/","name":"Titus Welliver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373100/","name":"Jamie Hector"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0032628/","name":"Amy Aquino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420833/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch the Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3258368025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen

programme.desc:
Salmon Fishing in the Yemen: Directed by Lasse Hallström. With Amr Waked, Emily Blunt, Catherine Steadman, Tom Mison. A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1441952/","name":"Salmon Fishing in the Yemen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzA2NTU5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjI0MDI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1441952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dfranzen70"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A gentle movie about faiths of different stripes","reviewBody":"A British fisheries expert is presented with a offer from a Yemenese sheikh to bring the sport of fly fishing to the Sahara in this charming, likable drama from Lasse Hallstrom. It features beautiful cinematography, even for those who don't particularly care about such things, and winning performances by Ewan McGregor and Emily Blunt. Salmon Fishing in the Yemen, at its heart, is not a movie about fish at all; it is about different kinds of faith and the degree to which people place their trust in them. Alfred Jones (McGregor) is an expert in all things ichthyic and works for the UK's version of the Department of the Interior. He is approached by the representative of a idealistic sheikh who loves to fish. The sheikh has it in his head that bringing the art of fly fishing for salmon to the Yemen River would be beneficial to his people (the river is dried up in places and is, obviously, in the middle of a desert). It is not a popular idea, and Jones, before and after taking a perfunctory meeting with Harriet, dismisses it as ludicrous, unsound, and downright absurd. (Dr. Jones is a bit of a straight arrow, you see.) And it would seem that would be the end of it, except that the Prime Minister's press secretary (Kristin Scott Thomas) sees this as an opportunity to foster Arab-Anglo relations at a time when, well, they're not so good. Long story short – Jones has to make the project work.

There are many obstacles to overcome. The water must be the right temperature and with the right amount of oxygen. Fish have to be found, somewhere, and imported. Negotiations must be had with local tribes who feel that bringing water to the desert is an abomination of some sort. And meanwhile, pressure mounts and mounts for Jones to pull it all off, since the sheikh is paying handsomely to the British government.

Alfred – Fred – and Harriet each have home lives that are in their own unique turmoil. Fred has been married for several years with no children, and it's clear that the love he and his wife once shared in full has dwindled considerably; she suddenly takes a job in Geneva, promising to visit him every so often. As for Harriet, the first man she has fallen for is suddenly deployed to Afghanistan. Each takes solace in their Yemen project.

What works best in this movie is the chemistry between Blunt and McGregor; the former plays an optimist ready for new challenges, and the latter is more of a stick-in-the-mud with little sense of humor. Okay, you who are reading this know that this is a plain setup, as this is not just a drama: it a romantic drama. Luckily for all of us, the movie doesn't descend into double entendres, sideward glances, awkward silences, and the like. Blunt and McGregor manage to avoid making the romance too light, too believable; we shouldn't be able to easily guess precisely how things will wind up, and we can't. Theirs is a working relationship that neither acknowledges as being anything but, and each is torn between their subconscious feelings for each other and for their respective significant others.

At one point, the sheikh asks Jones if he is a man of faith, and the expert replies that he is not. The sheikh rightly points out, however, that fishing itself relies on faith – the hope that something will occur, however improbable. A man puts a lure into the water. The outcome is not predetermined; he will most likely reel it in untouched. But he has faith that a fish will nibble at it and take the bait. The sheikh feels the same way about his fishing project. He has faith that doing so will enable the poor communities surrounding the river to thrive.

In the end, this is a quiet, elegant movie about love and hope, both of fishing and humanity. Excellent performances by the leads and able direction by Hallstrom make this a sort of soft-edged drama with romance and a bit of action.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":63397,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-04-20","keywords":"salmon,fishing,fish,desert,dam","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3792806169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI3OTE1MzMyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjg2NTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI3OTE1MzMyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjg2NTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embark son an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible, possible."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000191/","name":"Ewan McGregor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1289434/","name":"Emily Blunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0906756/","name":"Amr Waked"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002120/","name":"Lasse Hallström"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104811/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047306/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064479/","name":"Simon Beaufoy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3468186/","name":"Paul Torday"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6394365/","name":"Fuad Al-Qrize"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hud
Hud
programme.desc: Hud: Directed by Martin Ritt. With Paul Newman, Melvyn Douglas, Patricia Neal, Brandon De Wilde. Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057163/","name":"Hud","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjA3MzFlZDQtNTY3Ny00OTM1LWI1ODctNmE4ZWM5ZTU2MjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057163/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krdement"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forget Paul Newman and focus on Melvyn Douglas","reviewBody":"As a native of West Texas, I think this film is one of the finest in American cinema. You don't watch a movie - you experience a real time and place. I happen to love a bunch of Paul Newman's films (The 3 H's - Hud, Hombre and Harper; Cool Hand Luke; The Sting; The Hustler; The Color of Money...), but I'm not what you'd call a rabid fan. I think he is compelling, but has a fairly limited range. He is perfect in this role, but it isn't much different from The Hustler or Cool Hand Luke. However, watching Melvyn Douglas is like watching somebody that Marty Ritt pulled off of some ranch and filmed in his daily life. His performance is absolutely dead- on. The gravelly drawl, the old boy shuffle, his expression - the way his eyes take in the landscape or gaze intently into a bowl of ice cream while Hud talks - all incredibly REAL! I KNOW those old guys!\n\nMelvyn Douglas is a truly under-appreciated American acting genius whose career spanned over 5 decades. His range is tremendous. This is the same honey-tongued actor who is the perfect comic foil to Garbo's Ninotchka in the '30's (In fact, he is one of her only REPEAT leading men!) And his bluster-filled performance in I Never Sang for My Father (with another modern great, Gene Hackman) is also out of this world! Other commentators have addressed Hud's multi-faceted story and the incredible B&W cinematography. All wonderful - but the next time you watch this true American classic, focus on Douglas' Oscar-winning performance. You will be amazed! (And remind yourself of some of the early roles in romantic comedies - Ninotchka, That Uncertain Feeling, This Thing Called Love or Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House - this same actor performed so well.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"Passed","genre":["Drama","Western"],"datePublished":"1963-05-29","keywords":"rodeo cowboy,neo western,texas,rodeo,jack daniels","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2435365401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwOTJlMWUtZWIxOS00NTJkLTk0YjUtYjE0MGNlOTZjNTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwOTJlMWUtZWIxOS00NTJkLTk0YjUtYjE0MGNlOTZjNTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002048/","name":"Melvyn Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0623658/","name":"Patricia Neal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0728688/","name":"Martin Ritt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057370/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712419/","name":"Irving Ravetch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290809/","name":"Harriet Frank Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573505/","name":"Larry McMurtry"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pred ciljem
programme.desc: Dominique, ispitivač vozačkog posljednjeg dana na poslu prije odlaska u mirovinu, mora ispitati Marion koja je ispit pala pet puta. Ali čim napuste parking, automobil udari pješaka, koji odmah umre.... Dominique, ispitivač vozačkog posljednjeg dana na poslu prije odlaska u mirovinu, mora ispitati Marion koja je ispit pala pet puta. Ali čim napuste parking, automobil udari pješaka, koji odmah umre. Za dvadeset minuta morat će sakriti tijelo, pronaći alibi i vratiti se kao da se ništa nije dogodilo!

(And remind yourself of some of the early roles in romantic comedies - Ninotchka, That Uncertain Feeling, This Thing Called Love or Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House - this same actor performed so well.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"Passed","genre":["Drama","Western"],"datePublished":"1963-05-29","keywords":"rodeo cowboy,neo western,texas,rodeo,jack daniels","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2435365401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwOTJlMWUtZWIxOS00NTJkLTk0YjUtYjE0MGNlOTZjNTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwOTJlMWUtZWIxOS00NTJkLTk0YjUtYjE0MGNlOTZjNTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002048/","name":"Melvyn Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0623658/","name":"Patricia Neal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0728688/","name":"Martin Ritt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057370/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712419/","name":"Irving Ravetch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290809/","name":"Harriet Frank Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573505/","name":"Larry McMurtry"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="
